kitten general: You can't seem to find a queen to help clean all of this rot off of your fur.
You've found a good bush to hide in while the Rot Wound warriors train around you.
You can't play moss-ball here- the brittle leaves of the Rot Wound just crumble under your paws.
You pretend that the rot on your fur is mud, grasping at memories of times when you were carefree.
It's so cold here. You miss the c_nClan nursery.
